Package ohos.agp.window.dialog

Class DisplayDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.window.dialog.BaseDialog
      • ohos.agp.window.dialog.DisplayDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDialog

    public class DisplayDialog
extends BaseDialog
    Displays the content of a dialog box on that of a remote screen.

    This class is used for content projection on multiple windows on different screens.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  DisplayDialog.DialogProvider
      Encapsulates the information about a remote screen, including its height, width, IP address, port, and density in DPI.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.window.dialog.BaseDialog

        BaseDialog.DialogListener, BaseDialog.DisplayCallback, BaseDialog.RemoveCallback

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ohos.agp.window.dialog.IDialog
